The Easiest Plugin to Recommend Your WooCommerce Products ðŸ¤©

With Product Recommendations for WooCommerce, you can upsell and cross-sell smoothly.

This tool will let you showcase related items to your customers based on product categories, tags, or hand-picked selections on individual product pages.

Leveraging this feature in your WooCommerce store creates opportunities to highlight complementary or alternative products.

This will keep your customers hooked with personalized WooCommerce product suggestions to increase order values.

And ultimately it will encourage them to explore more of your inventory.

You can literally start from zero and create product suggestions in as low as 3 simple steps!

  1. Create A product recommendation engine.
  2. Configure what type of products you want to suggest to your customers.
  3. Hit save and you’re all set to go.

ðŸŒŸ Why Use Product Recommendations For WooCommerce? ðŸŒŸ

Showing related products is a smart way to sell more stuff online. When customers see other items they might like, they often buy more. This helps stores make more money.

And if you’re a WooCommerce store owner, Product Recommendations For WooCommerce makes it easier for you.

When customers see suggestions for other products, it can make them feel better about what they’re buying. In fact this makes the shopping experience easier and faster.

This is great for people who don’t like spending a lot of time shopping or are always in a hurry.

By using Product Recommendations For WooCommerce, you can:

  • Help customers find things they like
  • Make the shopping experience easier
  • Sell more stuff and increase your revenue.
  • Make customers happier

It’s a simple idea that can make a big difference for both store owners and customers.

ðŸŒŸ Advanced Product Recommendations Filters ðŸŒŸ

No other product recommendations plugin offers advanced product suggestion filters all for free.

But in Product Recommendations For WooCommerce, you’re getting the entire thing for free!

Here are the options you’re getting,

Filtering recommendations based on,

  • Product Title and Description
  • Product
  • Stock Status
  • Price – Regular Price & Sale Price
  • Average Ratings
  • Sale Start and End Date
  • Total Product Review
  • Total Sales
  • Product Categories & Tags

ðŸ‘‰ Custom Recommendations with Custom Rules

You can create custom product suggestions based on the filters like product titles and descriptions.

For example, if your product title has the word “winter” in it then you may choose to display those products only.

Like this, you can set up different conditions based on different rules to showcase more personalized product suggestions to your customers.

Privacy Policy

Product Recommendations for WooCommerce uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more how Appsero collects and uses this data.

Use of 3rd Party Services

This plugin relies on the use of external services, specifically YouTube, to embed and stream videos within the application. The following scenarios involve YouTube:
– Embedding and autoplaying videos using YouTube links.
– Streaming video content hosted on YouTube.

When using this plugin, please note that video data is sent to and processed by YouTube.

For more information about YouTubeâ€™s terms and policies, please refer to the following:
– YouTube Service: https://www.youtube.com
– YouTube Terms of Service: https://www.youtube.com/t/terms
– YouTube Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
sections.installation:
Easy Product Recommendations Addon for WooCommerce Installation Process in your WordPress Dashboard:

Step -1: Upload the Product Recommendations Addon for WooCommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and click Install Now

Step -2: Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

Step -3: Now, a new menu called Product Recommendations will appear on your WooCommerce Menu. From there, you can create and manage Product Recommendations Addon for WooCommerce.

Easy Recommendation Engines Process Using Product Recommendations Addon for WooCommerce:

Step -1: Hover on the Product Recommendations icon on your menu and click on Create New

Step -2: Give your engine title.

Step -3: Select your engine type.

Step -4: Thatâ€™s it; Register your engine.
sections.faq:
Can I filter products based on specific criteria?

Yes, you can narrow down product selections based on various criteria such as pricing, rating, stock status, product categories, and more.

Does it work for all product types?

Currently, Product Recommendations For WooCommerce works on all types of products including Simple products and Variable products .
